author: ajsutton
content:
> Teku says
> 
> ```
> 16:16:32.326 INFO  - Minimum genesis time reached
> ```
> 
> Which is not correct as the min genesis time is 14:00:00 and all deposits happened before that, so it should come up with 15:00:00 (3600s delay)
<@!557201004060213248> This is a misleading message - it means an ETH1 block has been reached that has a timestamp that when the delay is added meets the minimum genesis time criteria (ie block time is no longer a restriction for generating the genesis state).  It's going to take me some more thinking to come up with a succinct way of saying that...
